name: Meals on Wheels Volunteer Runner
author: Peter Carlsson
description: Safely deliver meals to clients in North York, between Bathurst and Victoria Park, and Steeles and Sheppard/HWY 401. Provide a regular check on client's well being. No vehicle is required. Minimum commitment of 12 shifts. Any weekday from 11:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. For more information, visit our website www.mealsonwheelsandmore.ca.

name: Small Business Mentors
author: Trevor Hansen
description: Abundant in color, and healthy, delicious goodness, cooking with these South American purple potatoes is a treat. Boil, mash, bake, or roast them. For taste cook with chicken stock, and a dash of extra virgin olive oil.

name: CultureLink-Luminato Festival Mentorship Circle Participant
author: Ali Connors
description: This beautiful sprouts recipe is the most glorious side dish on a cold winter’s night. Construct it with bacon or fake-on, but always make sure the sprouts are deliciously seasoned and appropriately sautéed.

name: Toronto Taste Entertainment Committee Member
author: Sandra Adams
description: Robust cuts of portuguese sausage add layers of flavour. Bake or fry until sausages are slightly browned and with a crispy skin. Serve warm and with cuts of pineapple for a delightful mix of sweet and savory flavour. This is the perfect dish after a swim in the sea.

ingredients.description: Pineapple or other fresh citrus fruit

name: Fundraising and Awareness Ambassador
author: Peter Carlsson
description: Crisp flavours and a bit of spice make this roasted chicken dish an easy go to when cooking for large groups. Top with Baja sauce for an extra kick of spice.

name: Fundraiser Raffle Volunteers
author: Ali Connors
description: This dish is a terrific pairing to almost any main. Bonus- it’s quick, easy to make, and turns even the simplest of dishes into a delicacy. Sweet coconut cream will leave your mouth watering, with yummy caramelized  flecks of rice adding an extra bit of taste. Fluff with fork before serving for best results.

name: Medical and/or Translation Escort
author: Trevor Hansen
description: This mellow and herb filled blending of simple ingredients is easy enough to mix that a novice host will feel like a seasoned bartender. Top with crushed basil, shake or stir.

name: Youth Photography Program Participants
author: Ali Connors
description: Join our special guests Phiona Mutesi and Robert Katende on a quest to empower tomorrow’s leaders. Phiona, the real-life inspiration behind Disney’s movie Queen of Katwe, and her coach/mentor Robert. Beautiful World will be hosting a “chess week” that includes 2 fun events during the week of April 3nd. We are looking for a photographer and/or a videographer for each event.

ingredients.description: Salt and black pepper to taste

name: Friendly Visitor for Dementia Residents
author: Sandra Adams
description: This is a fantastic opportunity for those interested in gerontology, social work, and nursing. You will be visiting a senior on a weekly basis (including conversation, games, and/or outings as per client interests) in order to develop a respectful, friendly, and caring relationship. Volunteers must be very sensitive to the needs of residents.  An prior understanding or experience with dementia is encouraged but not required.  This is a wonderful opportunity to work one-on-one with a resident where you will both enjoy social activities such as reading, chatting and spending time with one another.  You must maintain a professional attitude at all times.

name: School Program Assistant
author: Trevor Hansen
description: Assist our educators in the delivery of curriculum-based programs to children in elementary school, secondary school, and home school. These programs teach students about the natural world through direct experience, inquiry, observation, play, and stewardship action. Your volunteer work will directly support the Nature Centre’s mission of promoting knowledge of High Park’s natural systems and inspiring a sense of wonder, as you help our educators deliver programs in and about the natural world.
